description: Hearty red lentils simmered in tomato basil sauce over pasta, finished with a side of garlicky sautéed spinach.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Lentil Bolognese, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Hearty red lentils simmered in tomato basil sauce over pasta, finished with a side of garlicky sautéed spinach.. Scene: italian-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: A generous swirl of al dente pasta cradles a rich, simmering red lentil bolognese, adorned with vibrant fresh basil. A verdant, glistening mound of garlicky sautéed spinach rests elegantly beside. Bathed in soft, warm natural light, an inviting eye-level close-up with shallow depth of field captures tantalizing steam and rustic Italian comfort, highlighting the dish's hearty textures and inviting aroma.
